title: Dispatching business
description: Luminous already has a large number of dispatch destinations. We have created an environment where dispatch work can be performed continuously, such as not only IT and development but also nursing care and welfare, and we are constantly updating the dispatch destination information. Please show your talent at the Luminous dispatch destination.

title: Referral work
description: Not only dispatching, but also in referral work, there are a lot of variations in matching between you and the company, so after in-depth interviews and interviews, we will approach the referral destination firmly.

title: Visa consulting
description: Abundant achievements! We believe that visa consulting is most important to respond to the environment and needs of the acquirer. Also, as the environment changes, it is important to continue visa consulting. Experienced staff and administrative scrivener are our strengths.
